title: Microsoft slashes the price of the Lumia 950 and 950 XL in the UK
text:
Microsoft slashes the price of the Lumia 950 and 950 XL in the UK 
Published By: Neowin.net - Today 
Microsoft's latest Windows 10 flagship smartphones, the Lumia 950 and 950 XL, are yet to go on sale but they have already received a price c... Read Full Story ... Related articles:
